languages.text: "Судя по всему, вашей основной формацией будет А-48. Я учту это в тактике своего отряда для максимальной координации продвижения. Сила арбитров — в слаженности, и враг не устоит перед нашим напором".

"It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."
languages.original_text: "Судя по всему, вашей основной формацией будет А-48. Я учту это в тактике своего отряда для максимальной координации продвижения. Сила арбитров — в слаженности, и враг не устоит перед нашим напором".

traits.locale_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

"It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

languages.text: “看来，你们的主要行动阵型是A-48号阵型。我在规划战术的时候会考虑到这一点，最大限度提高行动效率。法务官的力量在于协同行动，那些敌人绝对挡不住我们的联合攻击。”
languages.original_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

traits.locale_text: “看来，你们的主要行动阵型是A-48号阵型。我在规划战术的时候会考虑到这一点，最大限度提高行动效率。法务官的力量在于协同行动，那些敌人绝对挡不住我们的联合攻击。”

languages.text: 「どうやら、君たちの主力編成はA-48になるようだな。それを念頭に置いて、{mf|俺|私}の部隊も戦術を立て、前進時の効果を最大にしよう。アービトレイターの強みは連携した行動にある。敵は{mf|俺|私}たちの共同攻撃の前に倒れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやら、君たちの主力編成はA-48になるようだな。それを念頭に置いて、{mf|俺|私}の部隊も戦術を立て、前進時の効果を最大にしよう。アービトレイターの強みは連携した行動にある。敵は{mf|俺|私}たちの共同攻撃の前に倒れるだろう」

languages.text: «Parece que su formación principal será la A-48. Planificaré las tácticas de mi escuadrón con eso en mente para maximizar nuestra eficacia en el avance. La fuerza de los Arbitrator reside en la coordinación: el enemigo caerá bajo nuestro asalto conjunto».
languages.original_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que su formación principal será la A-48. Planificaré las tácticas de mi escuadrón con eso en mente para maximizar nuestra eficacia en el avance. La fuerza de los Arbitrator reside en la coordinación: el enemigo caerá bajo nuestro asalto conjunto».

languages.text: "Anscheinend wird Eure Hauptformation A-48 sein. Ich werde die Taktik meines Trupps entsprechend planen, um die Effektivität unseres Vorstoßes zu maximieren. Die Stärke der Arbitratoren liegt in ihrem koordinierten Vorgehen – der Feind wird unserem gemeinsamen Ansturm erliegen."
languages.original_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend wird Eure Hauptformation A-48 sein. Ich werde die Taktik meines Trupps entsprechend planen, um die Effektivität unseres Vorstoßes zu maximieren. Die Stärke der Arbitratoren liegt in ihrem koordinierten Vorgehen – der Feind wird unserem gemeinsamen Ansturm erliegen."

languages.text: "Görünüşe göre ana dizilim şekliniz A-48 olacak. Ben de ilerleme sırasında etki seviyemize maksimuma çıkarmak adına mangamın taktiklerini bu doğrultuda planlayacağım. Yargıcılar, gücünü koordineli hareketten alır. Düşmanlarımız, ortak saldırılarımıza karşı koyamayacaklardır."
languages.original_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

traits.locale_text: "Görünüşe göre ana dizilim şekliniz A-48 olacak. Ben de ilerleme sırasında etkililiğimizi maksimum seviyeye çıkarmak adına mangamın taktiklerini bu doğrultuda planlayacağım. Yargıcılar, gücünü koordineli hareketten alır. Düşmanlarımız, ortak saldırılarımıza karşı koyamayacaklardır."

languages.text: « Visiblement, vous utiliserez A-48 comme formation principale. Afin d'optimiser notre efficacité lors de l'assaut, je dirigerai mon escouade en gardant cette information à l'esprit. La force des arbitrators repose sur leur organisation. L'ennemi tombera devant notre attaque coordonnée. »
languages.original_text: "It seems your main formation is going to be A-48. I will plan my squad's tactics with this in mind to maximise our effectiveness during the advance. The Arbitrators' strength is in coordinated action — the enemy will fall under our joint onslaught."

traits.locale_text: « Visiblement, vous utiliserez A-48 comme formation principale. Afin d'optimiser notre efficacité lors de l'assaut, je dirigerai mon escouade en gardant cette information à l'esprit. La force des arbitrators repose sur leur organisation. L'ennemi tombera devant notre attaque coordonnée. »
